name: Acute Viral Pharyngitis
chief_complaint: My throat hurts really bad and it's hard to swallow
prognosis: Excellent with resolution typically within 7-10 days
description: Common viral infection causing inflammation of the pharynx, typically caused by adenovirus, rhinovirus, or other common respiratory viruses. Differentiated from bacterial pharyngitis by absence of tonsillar exudate and negative strep test.
